name: GUNHEAD
description:
Gunhead is a direct sequel to Alientrap’s previous game Cryptark - taking it's complex fast paced gameplay and expanding it to an open world FPS experience.

  • Board and neutralize procedurally generated alien starships in a persistent non-linear campaign.
  • Fast paced jetpack-enabled FPS gameplay with 4 guns ready and loaded.
  • Each enemy ship is it’s own unique challenge. Set your loadout based on over 50 weapons and items before strategizing a plan of attack to take out the complex interconnected enemy security systems.
  • Takes place directly after the events of Cryptark. After betraying their government contractors, Gunhead’s crew is now on the run - search the open galaxy to loot and gather enough to survive.
